Style/CommentAnnotation.description:
Description

Checks formatting of special comments (TODO, FIXME, OPTIMIZE, HACK, REVIEW, NOTE).
Style/CommentAnnotation.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

Keywords: ['TODO', 'FIXME', 'OPTIMIZE', 'HACK', 'REVIEW', 'NOTE'] (type: list)
RequireColon: True (type: bool)
